USER QUERY: When I fast-on any Holiday_In switch between 17:00 and 23:00, set backlight to 75% on all Holiday_In devices.

__BEGIN_NUCORE_ROUTINE__
{
  "routine": {
    "id": 101,
    "name": "Holiday switches backlight on fast-on during evening",
    "parent": 0,
    "comment": "When any device is fast-on between 17:00 and 23:00 set backlight to 75%",
    "if": [
      { "(": 1 },
        { "==": { "device": "40 1B 26 1", "control": "DFON" } },
        { "or": 1 },
        { "==": { "device": "40 28 54 1", "control": "DFON" } },
        { "or": 1 },
        { "==": { "device": "40 2C 74 1", "control": "DFON" } },
      { ")": 1 },
      { "and": 1 },
      { "from": { "time": "17:00", "to": { "time": "23:00", "day": 0 } } }
    ],
    "then": [
      { "device": "40 1B 26 1", "command": "BL", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 75, "uom": "51", "precision": 2 } ] },
      { "device": "40 28 54 1", "command": "BL", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 75, "uom": "51", "precision": 2 } ] },
      { "device": "40 2C 74 1", "command": "BL", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 75, "uom": "51", "precision": 2 } ] }
    ],
    "else": [],
    "reasoning": "Apply backlight when any device is physically fast-on during the evening window; affect all Holiday_In devices since the trigger can be any of them and the routine applies the visual change to every unit."
  }
}
__END_NUCORE_ROUTINE__
